LanguageData.AT_CallLaborerTeam.label: Call Ergate team
LanguageData.AT_CallLaborerTeam.description: Call a group of 4 Ergate Anties to assist you for 4 days.
LanguageData.AT_CallMilitaryAidMelee.label: Call Close Combat team
LanguageData.AT_CallMilitaryAidMelee.description: Call a group of 10 Close Combat Anties to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.AT_CallMilitaryAidBomb.label: Bomb drop
LanguageData.AT_CallMilitaryAidBomb.description: Call a group of 10 Bombs to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.AT_CallMilitaryAidRanged.label: Call Ranged Combat team
LanguageData.AT_CallMilitaryAidRanged.description: Call a group of 5 Ranged Combat Anties to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.AT_CallMilitaryAidCluster.label: Call Cluster team
LanguageData.AT_CallMilitaryAidCluster.description: Call a group of 5 Cluster Anties to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.AT_CallDreadnoughtAid.label: Call Dreadnought
LanguageData.AT_CallDreadnoughtAid.description: Call a group of 3 Dreadnoughts to aid you in battle.
